so um you know what are some of these challenges that we have with e-discovery
and advanced Enterprise search in the cloud um nothing about e-discovery or Enterprise search is necessarily easy
um but when Legacy Solutions Trend stuff they're offering up in the cloud that doesn't magically become easy either so
there's some core tenants you have to meet in order to truly say that you are a cloud product obviously being Cloud
Deployable is one of them um you you need to be able to act on the
data in place without first exporting it kind of in Mass uh somewhere else that would really negate the benefits of the
cloud you want to deploy the tools to where the data resides in the cloud if you
have to ship the data to say a service provider or do some extensive manual labor to load and configure the system
you're not really a cloud offering and if you show up with a truckload of physical appliances and have to ask
where the loading dock is you're going to get laughed out the door you have to support virtualization the
product is going to need to immediately and rapidly install it needs to execute and efficiently operate in a virtualized
environment and that's all without rigid Hardware requirements or on-site physical access so if you have a
solution fused to Hardware Appliances or a complex on-site install processes
that's just not going to fly and if your product is burdensomly integrated with third-party databases or
other OEM technologies that can't easily be decoupled or frankly don't allow for cloud deployment you're not going to be
able to physically or even legally deploy in a cloud and then you need to support
parallelization um the benefit of cloud computing is is primarily accomplished by parallelizing
your software architecture and allowing you to spread your computation Cycles across a number of virtual machines so
if you've got a solutions that that's developed and configured around a monolithic processing scheme that's not going to work you need that highly
distributed processing across a multitude of servers so what we've done is uh via partnership
with ltch we're offering X1 rapid Discovery and some of the advantages of our
solution is we are Cloud Deployable and optimized we run on ec2 we run with virtual private clouds or VPC and uh
with EBS or elastic block storage so we truly take advantage of the technology that AWS offers we install remotely in a
matter of minutes our install process can be complete in five minutes and we can get data indexing immediately after

configure and maintain it on your own but if you want to you can optionally
